modName: Main Menu Theme Music Remix Replacement
summary: Replaces the introduction music at the main menu of the game with Plasma3Music\'s Remix.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/WZHb5.png[/img]

[size=5]This mod replaces the introduction music at the main menu of the game with Plasma3Music\'s Skyrim Theme Remix.[/size]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VaYy9d8PJC4]This is the remix.[/url]

[youtube]VaYy9d8PJC4[/youtube]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/IvKHT.png[/img]
NMM Installer is recommended.
To manually Install, extract the compressed files into your Skyrim directory folder.


[img]http://i.imgur.com/5DWJt.png[/img]
To manually Uninstall, delete [b]mus_maintheme.xwm[/b] from [b]\\Data\\music\\special[/b].

[size=5]A very special thanks to Plasma3Music for allowing me to use his remix in this mod.
He is a great musician. [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/Plasma3Music]Support him on YouTube![/url][/size]
author: kevinsterable - KDC - Plasma3Music

files.name: Skyrim Main Menu Theme Music Remix Replacement
files.fileName: Skyrim Main Menu Theme Music Remix Replacement-14153-1-0.zip
